body_html:
Hi @adamlerer
was your conclusion Maxwell vs Kepler based on the exact same config in terms of Nvidia Driver + cuda toolkit + cudnn ?
We saw a similar issue with cuda version > 8.0.27 (ie working fine with 8.0.27 and much slower with >= 8.0.44) on a Pascal hardware.
Just curious.

body:
Hi @adamlerer 
was your conclusion Maxwell vs Kepler based on the exact same config in terms of Nvidia Driver + cuda toolkit + cudnn ?
We saw a similar issue with cuda version > 8.0.27 (ie working fine with 8.0.27 and much slower with >= 8.0.44) on a Pascal hardware.
Just curious.
